name: Horned Serpent
description: The Horned Serpent is a large monstrosity with a powerful physique, capable of moving swiftly both in water and on land.
memorable: Its poisonous aura and the dangerous Corpse Cough disease make it a unique and menacing opponent.
goals: To hunt prey and spread disease, making the battlefield hazardous for foes.
relations: May be encountered alongside other water-based creatures or as a guardian of aquatic territories.
environment: Typically found in aquatic environments, swamps, or flooded areas.
strengths: High durability due to its natural armor and Hit Points, along with powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and lack of magical capabilities make it susceptible to tactical maneuvers.
attacks: Utilizes a deadly multiattack with gore and bite attacks, each with significant damage potential.
most_powerful_ability: Corpse Cough ability inflicts a debilitating disease, hindering the target's ability to take short or long rests.
skills: Has proficiency in stealth and perception, which allows it to ambush prey effectively.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage, adding to its combat resilience.
Has a Shielded Mind ability, protecting it from mental detection and scrying.
Poisonous Aura creates area-denial effects in combat.
Can breathe both air and water due to its amphibious nature.
Gem Gaze ability can inflict radiant damage to multiple creatures at once.
test_queries: large aquatic monster with poison aura
deadly water serpent that spreads disease
horned serpent with debilitating cough attack
dangerous serpent known for brutal melee strikes
formidable serpent easily moves between water and land
